Html:
So I downloaded the source unzipped, installed and tried to open the project in VS2008SP1 and the web portion wouldn't load.  web.csproj cannot be opened, project type not supported by this installation....

Anyone have a suggestion?

I have the same question and problem.  However I am running VS 2008 Team Suite without SP1.

I hope that someone has an idea, I would like to try and use this.
The exception usually raised when you do not have the ASP.NET MVC Framework installed.
Thank You, I figured that I was missing something.  I will give that a shot.
